Title: S6 Ep. 238 Sam Sunmonu - Future of Marketing
Description:
Sam Sunmonu is an expert at crafting a cold email that cuts through the noise and delivers impact. That is how I met him, he is the only person in lead gen that was able to pique my interest enough to reach out. Typically, every lead gen marketer that sends me emails sounds all the same. Sam’s email was amazing. His career story and growth as an entrepreneur starts from humble beginnings that includes graduating Duke University and then growing his own business 8Cast.io
